ground.name: Sports Authority Field at Mile High

content.text: Match ends, Roma 2, Manchester United 3.
Second Half ends, Roma 2, Manchester United 3.
Attempt missed. Miralem Pjanic (Roma) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.
Attempt blocked. Antonio Sanabria (Roma) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Miralem Pjanic.
Goal!  Roma 2, Manchester United 3. Francesco Totti (Roma) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top left corner.
Penalty conceded by Michael Keane (Manchester United) with a hand ball in the penalty area.
Attempt blocked. Ashley Cole (Roma) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Roma. Conceded by Tyler Blackett.
Corner,  Roma. Conceded by Chris Smalling.
Corner,  Manchester United. Conceded by Mihai Balasa.
Foul by Radja Nainggolan (Roma).
Shinji Kagawa (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Mihai Balasa (Roma) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Tyler Blackett (Manchester United).
Attempt saved. Leandro Castán (Roma) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Marco Borriello with a headed pass.
Foul by Nani (Manchester United).
Radja Nainggolan (Roma) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Attempt saved. Nani (Manchester United) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jesse Lingard.
Attempt blocked. Jesse Lingard (Manchester United) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Jesse Lingard (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Leandro Castán (Roma).
Nani (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Radja Nainggolan (Roma).
Offside, Roma. Radja Nainggolan tries a through ball, but Antonio Sanabria is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Francesco Totti (Roma) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked.
Attempt blocked. Miralem Pjanic (Roma) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Goal!  Roma 1, Manchester United 3. Miralem Pjanic (Roma) right footed shot from more than 35 yards to the top left corner. Assisted by Radja Nainggolan.
Attempt missed. Shinji Kagawa (Manchester United) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Leandro Castán (Roma) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Leandro Castán (Roma).
Chicharito (Manchester United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Offside, Roma. Francesco Totti tries a through ball, but Antonio Sanabria is caught offside.
Jesse Lingard (Manchester United) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Michele Somma (Roma).
Substitution, Manchester United. Chicharito replaces Tom Cleverley.
Leandro Castán (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jesse Lingard (Manchester United).
Substitution, Roma. Francesco Totti replaces Medhi Benatia.
Substitution, Roma. Marco Borriello replaces Mattia Destro.
Substitution, Roma. Antonio Sanabria replaces Alessandro Florenzi.
Substitution, Roma. Miralem Pjanic replaces Seydou Keita.
Substitution, Roma. Mihai Balasa replaces Salih Ucan.
Corner,  Manchester United. Conceded by Leandro Castán.
Will Keane (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Medhi Benatia (Roma).
Attempt missed. Salih Ucan (Roma) right footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the left. Assisted by Adem Ljajic.
Foul by Nani (Manchester United).
Ashley Cole (Roma) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Mattia Destro (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Will Keane (Manchester United).
Ashley Young (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Alessandro Florenzi (Roma).
Ashley Young (Manchester United) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Attempt missed. Alessandro Florenzi (Roma) right footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Adem Ljajic with a cross.
Foul by Ashley Young (Manchester United).
Alessandro Florenzi (Roma) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Ashley Young (Manchester United).
Medhi Benatia (Roma) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt missed. Mattia Destro (Roma) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Alessandro Florenzi.
Attempt missed. Ashley Cole (Roma) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.
Foul by Will Keane (Manchester United).
Salih Ucan (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Substitution, Manchester United. Nani replaces Antonio Valencia.
Substitution, Manchester United. Will Keane replaces Wayne Rooney.
Substitution, Roma. Leandro Castán replaces Alessio Romagnoli.
Substitution, Roma. Adem Ljajic replaces Juan Iturbe.
Substitution, Manchester United. Ben Amos replaces Sam Johnstone.
Substitution, Manchester United. Jesse Lingard replaces Danny Welbeck.
Substitution, Roma. Radja Nainggolan replaces Leandro Paredes.
Substitution, Manchester United. Shinji Kagawa replaces Reece James.
Substitution, Manchester United. Chris Smalling replaces Phil Jones.
Substitution, Roma. Michele Somma replaces Arturo Calabresi.
Substitution, Manchester United. Ashley Young replaces Juan Mata.
Substitution, Roma. Ashley Cole replaces Urby Emanuelson.
Second Half begins Roma 0, Manchester United 3.
Substitution, Manchester United. Luke Shaw replaces Ander Herrera.
Substitution, Manchester United. Michael Keane replaces Jonny Evans.
First Half ends, Roma 0, Manchester United 3.
Goal!  Roma 0, Manchester United 3. Wayne Rooney (Manchester United) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom left corner.
Penalty conceded by Urby Emanuelson (Roma) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Manchester United. Danny Welbeck draws a foul in the penalty area.
Attempt missed. Mattia Destro (Roma) right footed shot from long range on the right is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Arturo Calabresi.
Foul by Antonio Valencia (Manchester United).
Leandro Paredes (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Roma 0, Manchester United 2. Juan Mata (Manchester United) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Wayne Rooney.
Corner,  Manchester United. Conceded by Lukasz Skorupski.
Attempt saved. Juan Mata (Manchester United) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Ander Herrera.
Goal!  Roma 0, Manchester United 1. Wayne Rooney (Manchester United) right footed shot from outside the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Juan Mata.
Attempt saved. Alessandro Florenzi (Roma) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Leandro Paredes (Roma) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Ander Herrera (Manchester United).
Arturo Calabresi (Roma) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Danny Welbeck (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Ander Herrera (Manchester United) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match  (Roma).
Corner,  Roma. Conceded by Ander Herrera.
Attempt blocked. Leandro Paredes (Roma) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Mattia Destro (Roma) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ander Herrera (Manchester United).
Attempt blocked. Salih Ucan (Roma) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Offside, Roma. Alessandro Florenzi tries a through ball, but Mattia Destro is caught offside.
Foul by Alessio Romagnoli (Roma).
Danny Welbeck (Manchester United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Offside, Roma. Leandro Paredes tries a through ball, but Mattia Destro is caught offside.
Juan Iturbe (Roma) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Tom Cleverley (Manchester United).
Attempt missed. Mattia Destro (Roma) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high.
Attempt missed. Mattia Destro (Roma) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Salih Ucan.
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
